maniac:Strike.NAME: Strike
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
NL Apply !ExtraNumber! maniac:Weakness.

maniac:Defend.NAME: Defend
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Gain !M! *Plated *Armor.

maniac:BurnBlood.NAME: Burn Blood
maniac:BurnBlood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Next card you play this turn costs 0.
maniac:BurnBlood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next card you play this turn costs 0.

maniac:AbyssShackle.NAME: Abyss Shackle
maniac:AbyssShackle.DESCRIPTION: Enter maniac:Limbo. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Deal !D! damage.

maniac:ListenToNone.NAME: Listen To None
maniac:ListenToNone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block if there's no Attack in your hand. NL maniac:Limbo: Gain !ExtraNumber! additional Block.

maniac:UndyingDesire.NAME: Undying Desire
maniac:UndyingDesire.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Draw !ExtraNumber! card. NL Gain [E] [E] for each that costs 1 or more.

maniac:SpectralKnives.NAME: Spectral Knives
maniac:SpectralKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL maniac:Limbo: Increase the damage by !ExtraNumber!. NL Exhaust.

maniac:Intimidate.NAME: Intimidate
maniac:Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Appl !M! maniac:Frightened to ALL enemies. NL maniac:Limbo: Apply maniac:Slow in addition. NL Exhaust.

maniac:MeleeStrike.NAME: Melee Strike
maniac:MeleeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Can be played only when it's the only card in hand. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It's not the only card in my hand.

maniac:FindAShortcut.NAME: Find a Shortcut
maniac:FindAShortcut.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! cards in your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: maniac:Track twice. NL Exhaust.

maniac:GremlinCompanion.NAME: Gremlin Companion
maniac:GremlinCompanion.DESCRIPTION: Summon a random maniac:Gremlin. NL Exhaust.
maniac:GremlinCompanion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Summon a random maniac:enhanced maniac:Gremlin. NL Exhaust.

maniac:DashForward.NAME: Dash Forward
maniac:DashForward.DESCRIPTION: Enter maniac:Limbo. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

maniac:BackupWeapon.NAME: Backup Weapon
maniac:BackupWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Add a random maniac:weapon to your hand. NL maniac:Limbo: maniac:Enchant your weapons once first. NL Exhaust.

maniac:BladeShoot.NAME: Blade Shoot
maniac:BladeShoot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a *Blades to your hand. NL maniac:Limbo: Add an upgraded *Blades instead. Exit maniac:Limbo.

maniac:ShelteringEdge.NAME: Sheltering Edge
maniac:ShelteringEdge.DESCRIPTION: Enter maniac:Limbo. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your turn, exit maniac:Limbo.

maniac:BladesInCloak.NAME: Blades in Cloak
maniac:BladesInCloak.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a *Blades to your hand.

maniac:UntravelledPath.NAME: Untravelled Path
maniac:UntravelledPath.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! cards in your exhaust pile. NL maniac:Limbo: Draw a card.

maniac:WardAndDefend.NAME: Ward And Defend
maniac:WardAndDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a temp *Defend that gives !M! *Plated *Armor to your hand.

maniac:Confront.NAME: Confront
maniac:Confront.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a temp *Strike that applies !M! maniac:Weakness to your hand.

maniac:ShiftingShadows.NAME: Shifting Shadows
maniac:ShiftingShadows.DESCRIPTION: Until next turn, the damage you receive will be reduced by half. NL Exhaust.

maniac:WitnessTrueSorcery.NAME: Witness True Sorcery
maniac:WitnessTrueSorcery.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! of !ExtraNumber! cards to obtain. It costs 0 this turn. NL maniac:Limbo: !OtherNumber! additional cards in choices. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.
maniac:WitnessTrueSorcery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! of !ExtraNumber! cards to obtain. It costs 0 this combat. NL maniac:Limbo: !OtherNumber! additional cards in choices. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:ColdHeart.NAME: Cold Heart
maniac:ColdHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and draw !ExtraNumber! card. NL maniac:Limbo: Draw !OtherNumber! additional cards and exit maniac:Limbo.

maniac:ManipulatedFaith.NAME: Manipulated Faith
maniac:ManipulatedFaith.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card. NL Draw !ExtraNumber! cards. NL Enter maniac:Limbo.

maniac:ImpaleFlesh.NAME: Impale Flesh
maniac:ImpaleFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose HP half to the unblocked damage.

maniac:Whirlscythe.NAME: Whirlscythe
maniac:Whirlscythe.DESCRIPTION: Random enemies lose X HP X times. NL maniac:Limbo: Enemies lose HP once more for each Strength you have.
maniac:Whirlscythe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Random enemies lose X+1 HP X+1 times. NL maniac:Limbo: Enemies lose HP more times equal to your Strength.

maniac:GlassScratch.NAME: Glass Scratch
maniac:GlassScratch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! maniac:Bleeding twice. maniac:Limbo: Apply !ExtraNumber! additional maniac:Bleeding.

maniac:SorceryHour.NAME: Sorcery Hour
maniac:SorceryHour.DESCRIPTION: Enter maniac:Limbo. NL This turn, gain [E] after you play a card. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:Recollect.NAME: Recollect
maniac:Recollect.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, add a random exhausted card to your hand.
maniac:Recollect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, add a random exhausted card to your hand. It costs 0 this combat.

maniac:Feint.NAME: Feint
maniac:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! maniac:Weakness. If not, draw a card. NL When maniac:Tracked, gain !ExtraNumber! Strength.

maniac:AllOutAttack.NAME: All-Out Attack
maniac:AllOutAttack.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each card discarded. maniac:Limbo: Deal !M! additional damage. NL Exhaust.

maniac:SecretBackups.NAME: Secret Backups
maniac:SecretBackups.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When discarded from hand or maniac:Tracked, draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play this card.

maniac:ShatteredShield.NAME: Shattered Shield
maniac:ShatteredShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your lost HP. Every time this card is played, increases its costs by 1 this combat.

maniac:Infuriate.NAME: Infuriate
maniac:Infuriate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength for every !ExtraNumber! HP you have lost. NL maniac:Limbo: Gain 1 additional Strength. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Gain
Strength in total).

maniac:LootBarrage.NAME: Loot Barrage
maniac:LootBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each relic you have. NL maniac:Limbo: Increase the damage by !M! .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Deal
damage in total).

maniac:PerceiveDanger.NAME: Perceive Danger
maniac:PerceiveDanger.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! cards in your discard pile. NL maniac:Limbo: Shuffle a *Perception into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

maniac:ObscuredAttack.NAME: Obscured Attack
maniac:ObscuredAttack.DESCRIPTION: Enter maniac:Limbo. NL Deal !D! damage. NL maniac:Track !M! cards in your draw pile.

maniac:Hasten.NAME: Hasten
maniac:Hasten.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Gain [E] equal to its costs. NL maniac:Limbo: Draw !M! card.
maniac:Hasten.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. NL Gain [E] double to its costs. NL maniac:Limbo: Draw !M! cards.

maniac:AlleviatingSorcery.NAME: Alleviating Sorcery
maniac:AlleviatingSorcery.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Remove ALL debuffs on you. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:HammerStrike.NAME: Hammer Strike
maniac:HammerStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! maniac:Weakness. NL Apply !ExtraNumber! maniac:Bleeding.

maniac:EndOfTheRoad.NAME: End of the Road
maniac:EndOfTheRoad.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! maniac:Bleeding. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] if you're in maniac:Limbo.
maniac:EndOfTheRoad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! maniac:Bleeding. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] if you're in maniac:Limbo.

maniac:ReconstructWounds.NAME: Reconstruct Wounds
maniac:ReconstructWounds.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP X times. NL Gain X maniac:Bleeding. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:Lancinate.NAME: Lancinate
maniac:Lancinate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! maniac:Bleeding. NL If the enemy has maniac:Weakness, draw !ExtraNumber! card.

maniac:Knockdown.NAME: Knockdown
maniac:Knockdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! maniac:Weakness. NL If the enemy has maniac:Bleeding, draw !ExtraNumber! card.

maniac:SeekerKnife.NAME: Seeker Knife
maniac:SeekerKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When maniac:Tracked, permanently increase its damage by !M!. NL maniac:Limbo: Deal half damage to other enemies.

maniac:Quickdraw.NAME: Quickdraw
maniac:Quickdraw.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! Attacks in your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: maniac:Track !M! Attacks in your discard pile in addition. NL Exhaust.

maniac:ArmToTheTeeth.NAME: Arm to the Teeth
maniac:ArmToTheTeeth.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! of !ExtraNumber! maniac:Weapons from your maniac:Weapon Library to obtain. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:Reforge.NAME: Reforge
maniac:Reforge.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL maniac:Enchant your maniac:weapons in the Library !M! times. NL Exhaust.

maniac:FanTheHammer.NAME: Fan the Hammer
maniac:FanTheHammer.DESCRIPTION: Play top !M! cards in your draw pile and exhaust them. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:Traceback.NAME: Traceback
maniac:Traceback.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! cards in your exhaust pile. NL maniac:Limbo: maniac:Track !ExtraNumber! additional cards.

maniac:Blastwave.NAME: Blastwave
maniac:Blastwave.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

maniac:FlyTheKnives.NAME: Fly the Knives
maniac:FlyTheKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage by !M! for each Attack that costs 0 in your deck. NL maniac:Limbo: The damage is increased by additional !ExtraNumber!

maniac:Exterminator.NAME: Exterminator
maniac:Exterminator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card you have play this turn. NL maniac:Limbo: Gain [E]
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (Played
cards in total)

maniac:Retrospect.NAME: Retrospect
maniac:Retrospect.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! cards in your exhaust pile for every !M! cards you exhaust and the increase this track by 1.

maniac:SpectralFlash.NAME: Spectral Flash
maniac:SpectralFlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle a *Spectral *Flash that deals !M! additional damage into your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: Draw a card.

maniac:RallyToMe.NAME: Rally To Me
maniac:RallyToMe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 0, draw a card.
maniac:RallyToMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card that costs 0, draw a card.

maniac:ExpectedMoves.NAME: Expected Moves
maniac:ExpectedMoves.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! Skills in your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: maniac:Track !M! Skills in your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

maniac:DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
maniac:DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Take !M! damage. NL maniac:Limbo: Take !ExtraNumber! less damage.

maniac:SeeingDetails.NAME: Seeing Details
maniac:SeeingDetails.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! maniac:Weakness. NL maniac:Limbo: Apply twice.

maniac:TimeForm.NAME: Time Form
maniac:TimeForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Take an extra turn for every !M! cards you play.
maniac:TimeForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take an extra turn for every !M! cards you play.

maniac:UnseenTerror.NAME: Unseen Terror
maniac:UnseenTerror.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! maniac:Weakness to a random enemy after you play a card this turn.

maniac:TorturousScreams.NAME: Torturous Screams
maniac:TorturousScreams.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a *Torture into your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: Shuffle that *Torture into your discard pile rather than draw pile.

maniac:Collecting.NAME: Collecting
maniac:Collecting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, obtain a random relic. NL maniac:Limbo: The relic will not be common. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:WickedInstincts.NAME: Wicked Instincts
maniac:WickedInstincts.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if the top card of your draw pile is an Attack, play top !M! cards of draw pile. If it is a Skill, draw !ExtraNumber! card(s).

maniac:TwistedEddies.NAME: Twisted Eddies
maniac:TwistedEddies.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL damage from enemies to 0 in !M! turns. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:Inhibition.NAME: Inhibition
maniac:Inhibition.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Limbo: Gain !B! Block and this turn, heal 1 HP whenever you play a Skill. Exit maniac:Limbo. NL Otherwise, gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:ExceedEnchantment.NAME: Exceed Enchantment
maniac:ExceedEnchantment.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Enchant your maniac:weapons in the Library X times. NL maniac:Limbo: Double the effect. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.
maniac:ExceedEnchantment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: maniac:Enchant your maniac:weapons in the Library X + 1 times. NL maniac:Limbo: Double the effect. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:ShadowContact.NAME: Shadow Contact
maniac:ShadowContact.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a temp copy of a random card in your draw pile to your hand.
maniac:ShadowContact.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the start of your turn, add a temp copy of a random card in your draw pile to your hand.

maniac:ReachVictory.NAME: Reach Victory
maniac:ReachVictory.DESCRIPTION: maniac:Track !M! cards in your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: Gain [E] [E]
maniac:ReachVictory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL maniac:Track !M! cards in your draw pile. NL maniac:Limbo: Gain [E] [E]

maniac:StormOfTime.NAME: Storm of Time
maniac:StormOfTime.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies !D! times to the number of cards you've played this combat. NL maniac:Limbo: Apply !M! maniac:Slow at first.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (You have play
cards this combat)

maniac:Simulacrum.NAME: Simulacrum
maniac:Simulacrum.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a temp copy of that card to your hand.
maniac:Simulacrum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a temp copy of that card to your hand. It costs 0 this combat.

maniac:HammerDown.NAME: Hammer Down
maniac:HammerDown.DESCRIPTION: Stun ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. maniac:Unreal.

maniac:Trap.NAME: Trap
maniac:Trap.DESCRIPTION: Until next turn, whenever an enemy attacks you, apply !M! maniac:Bleeding back.

maniac:Perception.NAME: Perception
maniac:Perception.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. If it's to attack, stun it. If it's to apply debuffs, gain !M! Artifact. If it's to power up, draw !ExtraNumber! card. NL Exhaust.
maniac:Perception.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. If it's to attack, stun it. If it's to apply debuffs, gain !M! Artifact. If it's to power up, draw !ExtraNumber! cards. NL Exhaust.

maniac:Blades.NAME: Blades
maniac:Blades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
maniac:Blades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies
times. NL Exhaust.

maniac:BigSword.NAME: Big Sword
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cards containing "Strike" deal !M! additional damage.
Cards containing "Strike" deal !M! additional damage. NL Whenever you play an Attack in a single turn, gain !ExtraNumber! Strength that turn.

maniac:BitingDagger.NAME: Biting Dagger
maniac:BitingDagger.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply maniac:Weakness.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! maniac:Weakness.
Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply !M! maniac:Weakness and maniac:Bleeding.

maniac:BurglaryToolkit.NAME: Burglary Toolkit
maniac:BurglaryToolkit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, gain coins.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, gain !M! coins.

maniac:CursedStaff.NAME: Cursed Staff
maniac:CursedStaff.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill, deal damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you play a Skill, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this deals unblocked damage to an enemy, apply !ExtraNumber! maniac:Inferno *Flame.

maniac:DoomScythe.NAME: Doom Scythe
maniac:DoomScythe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, play a *Doom *Scythe.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, play a *Doom *Scythe that deals !M! damage and applies !ExtraNumber! maniac:Frightened.
Whenever you play an Attack, play a *Doom *Scythe that deals !M! damage and applies !ExtraNumber! maniac:Frightened and maniac:Doom.

maniac:DoomScytheAttack.NAME: Doom Scythe
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! maniac:Frightened.
Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! maniac:Frightened. NL Apply !M! maniac:Doom.

maniac:DualMachetes.NAME: Dual Machetes
maniac:DualMachetes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card containing "Strike", play a *Strike.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card containing "Strike", play a *Strike that deals !M! additional damage and applies !M! Vulnerable.
Whenever you play a card containing "Strike", play two *Strikes that deal !M! additional damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.

maniac:HeavySkull.NAME: Heavy Skull
maniac:HeavySkull.DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal additional damage and apply Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal !M! additional damage and apply !ExtraNumber! Vulnerable.
Your Attacks deal !M! additional damage and apply !ExtraNumber! Vulnerable and maniac:Agonal.

maniac:ScorchingSpear.NAME: Scorching Spear
maniac:ScorchingSpear.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked damage, deal damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked damage, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.
Whenever you deal unblocked damage, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and apply !ExtraNumber! random debuffs.

maniac:Torture.NAME: Torture
maniac:Torture.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When Exhausted, Exhaust a card in hand at random.

maniac:TheUndigested.NAME: The Undigested
maniac:TheUndigested.DESCRIPTION: The Mawelling gains !M! *Swelling and heals 4 HP. NL Lose 2 *Saliva. NL Exhaust.
